mapper.select: select user.u_id, pw, name, bank, account, address, phone, point, u_x, u_y, road_address from orders, user where p_id=#{p_id} and user.u_id=orders.u_id;
select p_id,user.u_id,u_x,u_y from user left join orders on user.u_id=orders.u_id where orders.p_id=#{p_id};
mapper.update: update orders set menu=#{menu}, price=#{price}, request=#{request} where p_id=#{p_id} and u_id=#{u_id};
mapper.insert: insert into blame ( b_id, u_id, blamed_id, reason) values(NULL, #{u_id},#{blamed_id},#{reason});
